articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Urges U.S. to Choose between Two Options
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Urges U.S. to Choose between Two Options
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry released the following statement on Tuesday:
					The DPRK's third nuclear test is a resolute step for self-defence taken by it to cope with the U.S. hostile act against it.
					
					Its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 in December last year was a peaceful one from A to Z which was conducted according to its plan for scientific and technological development for economic construction and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					The world including hostile countries recognized its application satellite's entry into orbit and greatly admired its development of space technology.
					
					The U.S., however, again prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up a new "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its satellite launch a violation of the UNSC's "resolution".
					
					Encroaching upon the right to satellite launch is an unpardonable grave hostile act as it is an infringement on the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					By origin, the DPRK had neither need nor plan to conduct a nuclear test.
					
					The DPRK's nuclear deterrence has already acquired the trustworthy capability strong enough to make a precision strike at bases for aggression and blow them up at a single blow no matter where they are on the earth.
					
					It was the DPRK's goal to focus efforts on economic construction and the improvement of the standard of people's living by dint of nuclear deterrence for self-defence provided by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					The DPRK exercised its maximum self-restraint when the U.S. fabricated the "presidential statement" over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes by abusing the UNSC in April last year.
					
					But the DPRK's patience reached its limit as the U.S. intensified such hostile act as implementing before anyone else the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions", far from apologizing for its renewed wanton violation of the DPRK's right to satellite launch.
					
					The main objective of the current nuclear test is to express the surging resentment of the army and people of the DPRK at the U.S. brigandish hostile act and demonstrate the will and capability of Songun Korea to defend the sovereignty of the country to the last.
					
					The DPRK's nuclear test is a just step for self-defence not contradictory to any international law.
					
					The U.S. has long put the DPRK on the list of preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					It is quite natural just measure for self-defence to react to the U.S. ever-increasing nuclear threat with nuclear deterrence.
					
					The DPRK withdrew from the NPT after going through legitimate procedures and chose the way of having access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence to protect the supreme interests of the country.
					
					There have been on the earth more than 2 000 nuclear tests and at least 9 000 satellite launches in the UN history spanning over 60 years but there has never been a UNSC resolution on banning any nuclear test or satellite launch.
					
					It is the U.S. that has conducted more nuclear tests and launched more satellites than any others. It, however, cooked up the UNSC's "resolution" banning only the DPRK's nuclear test and satellite launch. This is the breach of international law and the height of double standards.
					
					Had the UNSC been impartial even a bit, it would not have taken issue with a sovereign state's exercise of the right to self-defence and its scientific and technological activities for peaceful purposes but with the U.S. policy for preemptive nuclear strike, a threat to global peace and security, to begin with.
					
					The current nuclear test is the primary countermeasure taken by the DPRK in which it exercised its maximum self-restraint.
					
					If the U.S. takes a hostile approach toward the DPRK to the last, rendering the situation complicated, it will be left with no option but to take the second and third stronger steps in succession.
					
					The inspection of ships and maritime blockade touted by the hostile forces will be regarded as war actions and will invite the DPRK's merciless retaliatory strikes at their strongholds.
					
					The U.S., though belatedly, should choose between the two options: To respect the DPRK's right to satellite launch and open a phase of detente and stability or to keep to its wrong road leading to the explosive situation by persistently pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					In case the U.S. chooses the road of conflict finally, the world will clearly see the army and people of the DPRK defend its dignity and sovereignty to the end through a do-or-die battle between justice and injustice, greet a great revolutionary event for national reunification and win a final victory.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Successful 3rd Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Successful 3rd Underground Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released the following report on Tuesday:
					The scientific field for national defence of the DPRK succeeded in the third underground nuclear test at the site for underground nuclear test in the northern part of the DPRK on Tuesday.
					
					The test was carried out as part of practical measures of counteraction to defend the country's security and sovereignty in the face of the ferocious hostile act of the U.S. which wantonly violated the DPRK's legitimate right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					The test was conducted in a safe and perfect way on a high level with the use of a smaller and light A-bomb unlike the previous ones, yet with great explosive power. It was confirmed that the test did not give any adverse effect to the surrounding ecological environment.
					
					The specific features of the function and explosive power of the A-bomb and all other measurements fully tallied with the values of the design, physically demonstrating the good performance of the DPRK's nuclear deterrence that has become diversified.
					
					The nuclear test will greatly encourage the army and people of the DPRK in their efforts to build a thriving nation with the same spirit and mettle as displayed in conquering space, and offer an important occasion in ensuring peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Political Bureau of WPK Central Committee Meets
articles.content:
Political Bureau of WPK Central Committee Meets
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place here on Monday.
					Present there were members of the Presidium, members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					The meeting adopted a decision "On marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as grand festivals of victors".
					
					The decision emphasized the need to further deepen and accomplish the sacred cause of holding in high esteem the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il as eternal leaders of the WPK and the revolution.
					
					The decision called for splendidly and significantly organizing political events marking the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the 65th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					
					According to it, various political events will be held with splendor to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. They will include a parade of the Korean People's Army (KPA), mass demonstration of Pyongyang citizens, grand mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" and army-people joint meeting with war veterans.
					
					The decision stressed the need to successfully rebuild the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and spruce up the revolutionary battle sites, revolutionary sites and revolutionary museums including the revolutionary museum at Kim Il Sung University, the Museum of the Fatherland Liberation War and the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum.
					
					It called for newly building a martyrs cemetery of the KPA in Pyongyang and sprucing up KPA martyrs cemeteries and monuments to the fallen fighters of the KPA in various parts of the country.
					
					It underlined the need to resolutely foil all the hostile forces' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK by achieving proud victory in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard.
					
					It also underscored the need for all fields and units to do a lot of good works for the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Republic.
					
					It called for staging an all-out action of high intensity for reliably protecting the security and sovereignty of the country in view of the prevailing grave situation and marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with fresh achievements in bolstering up capability for self-defence.
					
					It stressed the need to continue launching satellites of Kwangmyongsong series and powerful long-range rockets.
					
					It called on the KPA to keep itself fully ready for combat and put maximum spurs to rounding off its combat preparedness in order to bolster up one-beats-a hundred combat capability. It stressed that once an order is issued, the KPA should blow up the stronghold of aggression at a strike and wipe out the brigandish U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet army to the last man and thus accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					The decision called for sincerely helping the army and significantly conducting the work for putting forward and preferentially treating the war veterans and wartime merited persons as a social movement on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the war victory.
					
					It underscored the need to give further spurs to building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					It referred to the tasks for completing the preparations for the universal 12-year compulsory education within this year, establishing a medical information service network and telemedicine system, building a children's hospital, a dental hospital and a recovery center and winding up the first phase project for updating the Hungnam Pharmaceutical Factory.
					
					It also underscored the need to build a modern combined center for sports trainings and different kinds of mass sporting facilities and raise hot wind of sports throughout the country.
					
					It called for face-lifting the central part of Pyongyang and building more modern cultural facilities including pleasure grounds and Munsu Wading Pool.
					
					The decision stressed the need to arouse all compatriots to the struggle for resolutely foiling the anti-DPRK moves and "sanctions" racket of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors and thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration so as to open up a new phase for national reunification.
					
					It called for conducting external activities to grandly celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as a common event for the anti-imperialist independent forces and the world progressive people.

articles.title: President of Mauritania Wishes Korean People Success in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
President of Mauritania Wishes Korean People Success in Building Thriving Nation
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, president of Mauritania, sincerely wished the Korean people bigger success in building a thriving nation.
					He said this when receiving credentials from Hwang Hyong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Mauritania, on February 4.
					
					The president said Mauritania and the DPRK have developed the excellent friendly relations for a long time since their establishment.
					
					The president hoped the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop in various fields.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans and Foreigners Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans and Foreigners Here
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans headed by Ko Tae Chun, vice-chairperson of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan, arrived here Tuesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Arriving here on the same day were Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trade Co. Ltd., of China, and his party to take part in the 17th Kimjongilia Festival.
					
					Figure skaters of Russia, Ukraine, Estonia and Canada also arrived here to participate in the 22nd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting Held at Paektusan Secret Camp
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting Held at Paektusan Secret Camp
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting took place at the Paektusan Secret Camp Tuesday for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there were Kim Ki Nam and Kim Yong Chun, officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and people from all walks of life.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung, the invincible guiding force and laid an eternal foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					He stressed the need to achieve the final victory in an all-out action against the U.S. in the new century and build the most powerful country and the people's paradise on this land looked up to by the world, under the uplifted banner of the WPK led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					KPA General Kang Phyo Yong said that the revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who provided the invincible military muscle and single-minded unity, holding arms and with intense love for the country and people, will shine long.
					
					Choe solemnly pledged to clearly show the invincible might of the revolutionary army which has grown under the care of the commanders of Mt. Paektu and fly higher the flags bearing the beaming images of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the red flag of the WPK.
					
					Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that Kim Jong Il enforced the policies of attaching importance to youth and loving youth and brought them up to be the reliable political reserves of the party and the successors of the revolution.
					
					He resolved to display the pride of being reserve combat unit and detached force of Kim Jong Un and win the final victory in building a thriving nation, holding high the torch of revolution given by Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fireworks were displayed in the sky above the Paektusan Secret Camp.

articles.title: Participation in New Year Performance Is One of Schoolchildren's Wishes in DPRK
articles.content:
Participation in New Year Performance Is One of Schoolchildren's Wishes in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- It is one of wishes of the schoolchildren in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to take part in New Year performance.
					To realize this desire, they have to win high appreciation at annual individual art contest of schoolchildren and national schoolchildren's art festival.
					
					Among those children who fulfilled their desire at the current New Year performance are Jang Jin Ju, an 8-year-old pupil of Rajin Primary School in Rason City, Kim Kuk Hyon, a 13-year-old student of Cholligil Secondary School in Kaechon City of South Phyongan Province, and school boys and girls of Chongsu Secondary School in Sakju County of North Phyongan Province and Kiyang Primary School in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					
					In the performance they fully displayed their excellent artistic talent and skills.
					
					Students of Chongsu Secondary School successfully performed a sports dance "We Are the Happiest in the World" to be loudly applauded by the audience.
					
					The school has placed first in national art festival of schoolchildren every year, being awarded tens of citations, according to Jo Son Hui, a teacher of the school.
					
					"We Will Become Tankers", performed by boys at the ages of 7-11 from Kiyang Primary School, also won popularity in the performance.
					
					Jon Il Gwang, a teacher of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, told KCNA that Kiyang Primary School is well known throughout the country for its excellent boys' dance group. Son Wi Gwang, who acted as the hero of the dance, attracted deep interest of dance experts for his gifted talent, Jon added.
					
					Participation in lunar New Year performance means only the start of schoolchildren's dream. Their earnest desire is to become talents greatly helpful to building a civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: Successful Nuclear Test Lifts Morale of DPRK People
articles.content:
Successful Nuclear Test Lifts Morale of DPRK People
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The news about the third nuclear test in the DPRK is stirring up the morale of its servicepersons and civilians.
					The test displayed the pluck and will and inexhaustible strength of Songun (military-first) Korea, a general officer of the Korean People's Army said.
					
					Describing it as a special event of weighty significance in the history of the Korean nation, the officer, Tong Tae San, told KCNA:
					
					"The successful nuclear test has further developed the KPA into an invincible army with powerful deterrent, and the world came to clearly see what provocation to the dignity and security of the DPRK resulted in.
					
					The enemies' increased pressure will only incite the DPRK's repulsion and harden its people's will for retaliation. This was evidently proven by the DPRK's diversified nuclear deterrence."
					
					Kim Kyong Su, a section chief of the Central Statistic Bureau, said:
					
					"The glad news made me naturally shout 'Hurrah' and 'Long live respected Marshal Kim Jong Un!'
					
					I feel strength and confidence that my country will emerge victorious as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					We have nothing to be afraid of. Now is the time to settle accounts with the Yankees.
					
					The United States should ponder over the tragic consequences to be entailed from its wrong choice."

articles.title: Pyongyang Citizens Delighted at News of Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Pyongyang Citizens Delighted at News of Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Citizens of Pyongyang were very delighted to hear the news about the successful 3rd underground nuclear test which was conducted on Tuesday.
					Many of them were seen talking about the news with pleasure before large TV displays installed in park of Pyongyang Railway Station and other parts of the city.
					
					In this regard KCNA had interviews with them.
					
					Question: Would you tell about your opinion on the nuclear test?
					
					Answer by Kim Yong Il, an engineman of the West Pyongyang Service Brigade of Engine:
					
					The news makes me feel relieved. What I want to tell the world is that the enemies' persistent hostile action will only invite the DPRK's stronger countermeasures for national security and sovereignty.
					
					Our country has to possess something more powerful than A-bomb in order to protect its people's security and regional peace. I am sure that the country's action to annihilate the enemies will grow stronger along with tightened sanctions by the U.S.-led forces hostile to it.
					
					Q: The U.S. and its followers call for "resolution" and "sanctions" by invoking the UN Security Council. What's your opinion?
					
					Answer by O Il Jin, a department head of Kim Chol Ju University of Education:
					
					The UNSC is no more than a "U.S. security council". So, we have neither recognized its unreasonable "resolution" nor been afraid of "sanctions" and pressure. Since the DPRK made its decision, it should take tougher countermeasures.
					
					The U.S. has persistently termed the DPRK's satellite a "missile". In my opinion, it is needed to show what a true missile is by firing it at a target set in open sea off the northeastern part of the U.S.

articles.title: Action for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Action for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the Solidarity for Progress, held a meeting on Feb. 6 at which they called for struggling to realize peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					The UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" backed by the U.S. is very unjust in light of international law and from the national stand, the organizations said.
					
					The U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercises in which the U.S. nuclear-powered submarines and other warships are involved will only escalate the tensions on the Korean Peninsula as they are aimed at a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, they noted.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime keen on war maneuvers in league with foreign forces will never be able to evade stern judgment of the nation desirous of peace, they stressed.
					
					Disgraceful is the history of barbarians who totally ditched the south-north joint declarations, they said, stressing that the progressive forces will wage actions in unity in order to hand down a peaceful reunified country to posterity.

articles.title: DPRK's Underground Nuclear Test Is Just Measure for Self-defence: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Underground Nuclear Test Is Just Measure for Self-defence: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The 3rd underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK today is part of substantial counter-action against the U.S. hostile policy and arbitrary practices. 
					The U.S. attitude toward the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, in particular, as was the case with all its hostile acts against the DPRK, pushed the resentment of its army and people to an unbearable phase.
					
					The high-handed logic of the U.S. that the DPRK should not be allowed to launch a satellite while all others are permitted to do so amounts to the worst insult and mockery at the Koreans.
					
					The DPRK has already served a strong warning to the U.S. because it persistently revealed its sinister attempt to strain the situation with such logic.
					
					The U.S. should draw a lesson from its actions which compelled the DPRK to comprehensively reexamine the nuclear issue in April last year and refrain from pushing the situation to such pass no one desires through its excessive hostile reaction.
					
					But the U.S. did not lend an ear to this.
					
					The U.S. was so arrogant as to prod the UN Security Council into cooking up the "resolution" which calls for economic "sanctions" and "crucial steps", negating the DPRK's right to satellite launch, and took the lead in implementing it.
					
					The UNSC "resolution" 2087 fabricated with the U.S. as a main player is a criminal document for state-sponsored terrorism as it negates the right of the Korean people to develop as well as their right to self-determination and existence.
					
					The U.S. has incited international cooperation to stifle the DPRK while massively deploying nuclear attack means in south Korea and its vicinity and staging exercises for preemptive attack on the DPRK in a bid to strain the situation.
					
					The U.S. brazen-faced arbitrary practices touched off bitter anti-U.S. sentiments among the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK can no longer live, tightening belt. Let us settle accounts with the U.S. so as to defend the sovereignty of the nation and achieve a final victory.
					
					Let's demonstrate the might of the Koreans before the U.S. which looks down upon them. This is the unshakable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					The third underground nuclear test physically demonstrated the high performance of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent which has become smaller, lighter and diversified as it was a primary counter-measure in which it exercised its maximum self-restraint.
					
					Even the enemies must know well its explosive force and level of the nuclear test as they observed it. 
					
					The nuclear test conducted by the DPRK represented the towering resentment of its service personnel and people and demonstrated their will and capability to safeguard their sovereignty. No one has the right to take issue with it as it is the legitimate step for self-defence in full conformity with the UN Charter.
					
					The DPRK's nuclear deterrent serves as a treasured sword for foiling the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists and protecting its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					Whether the DPRK will take the second and third tougher measures will entirely depend on the option to be taken by the U.S. in the future. 
					
					The U.S. should admit its mistake and correct it.
					
					If the U.S. again defies the warnings served by the DPRK, its army and people will never miss such historic opportunity given by the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Traitor Lee Myung Bak of His Anti-DPRK Confrontation Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Traitor Lee Myung Bak of His Anti-DPRK Confrontation Remarks
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea and his close confidants recently held a binge where they talked about "provocation from the north" and called the DPRK an "organization."
					A bylined commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says this reminds one of a thief crying "stop the thief!" and reveals bad habit and ill-natured way of thinking of the traitor.
					
					The commentary terms the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors the very one engrossed in provocations, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					Successive fascist rulers of south Korea who got ill-fame for their moves against the nation and reunification dared not brand the DPRK as an "organization."
					
					Traitor Lee is, indeed, an immature guy and imbecile ignorant of elementary concept of an organization and state.
					
					In his early period in office, Lee was ridiculed as "2MB" as he let loose a spate of remarks bereft of common sense. It is disgrace for the south Koreans that Lee is still allowed to roll his tongue.
					
					It seemed that he called the DPRK an "organization" in a bid to tarnish its authority but this is no more than a foolish act of undercutting his image.
					
					This is by no means fortuitous that voices dismissing his remarks as "words under common sense" are heard from south Koreans.
					
					However hard he may try, Lee can never block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK will demonstrate its dignity and sovereignty as a legitimate sovereign state in the future, too, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Songun Serves as Powerful Treasured Sword for National Independence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Serves as Powerful Treasured Sword for National Independence: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are optimistic about the final victory despite hostile forces' unprecedented anti-DPRK confrontation racket. It is attributable to the great Songun politics.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					Songun politics serves as a powerful might putting the dignity of the nation on the highest level and firmly defending the sovereignty of the country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. and its followers cooked up at the UN Security Council a brigandish "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes. They are now taking issue with the DPRK's self-defensive counteraction while talking about its "additional provocation". They have now gone reckless, crying out for military counteraction.
					
					However, the hostile forces are not daring to provoke the DPRK even though they are desperate to do so.
					
					This is because the military might of the DPRK has reached the remarkably high level thanks to the great Songun politics.
					
					The Songun politics serves as a powerful strength as it consolidates in every way the driving force of the Korean nation aspiring after national unity and reunification and carves out the independent destiny of the nation.
					
					It has also become the motive power giving fuller play to the independent spirit of the nation and consolidating in every way the driving force of the revolution based on the powerful military capabilities.
					
					It provided the Koreans with highest dignity and pride.
					
					The Korean nation will frustrate confrontation racket of the imperialists and traitors against the DPRK and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification as there is the driving force of the revolution increasingly growing stronger under the banner of Songun, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Grasping People's Mindset
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Grasping People's Mindset
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- To educate the people in a revolutionary way and firmly grasp their mindset is an important issue deciding victory or defeat of the anti-imperialist and revolutionary struggle.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The mainstay for revolution is single-minded unity and the mainstay for the unity is people's mindset which is affected by politics.
					
					Many people in capitalist countries are infected with decadent lifestyle including the gun-related culture because they are degenerated ideologically and mentally and their social system allows and encourages it.
					
					Socialist society where the class enmity was perfectly eliminated serves as a key foundation which helps stabilize the people's mindset and nurture it in a sound and revolutionary way.
					
					It is, however, impossible for a socialist ruling party to consolidate and develop socialism unless it does proper work for grasping the people's mindset under such condition where the times and international environment have changed and the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning has become evermore pronounced.
					
					It was because of ruling parties which failed to hold the people's mindset that socialism collapsed in some countries at the end of last century.
					
					The historical lesson proves that if a country fails to firmly grasp its people's mindset, not understanding them, its socialism will play into the hands of imperialists and renegades, and it is impossible to defend socialism.
					
					Today the imperialist forces pin a great hope on their smear psychological campaign called "coloring revolution".
					
					The "coloring revolution" is, in essence, warfare of disrupting and winning the people's mindset.
					
					It is necessary to establish solid firewall of blocking the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and awaken the people in revolutionary and class ways so as not to leave the state and society to the tender mercy of the imperialist forces.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills under Fire by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills under Fire by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on February 4 in denunciation of the joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers in the East Sea of Korea.
					The statement condemned the joint naval exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces as an extremely dangerous move of driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					It said they are resorting to the policy of strength against the DPRK in a bid to put into practice the criminal "resolution" of the UN Security Council against it.
					
					The purpose sought by the U.S. imperialists is to reduce the DPRK to submission by military threat and UN "sanctions" against it and stifle its socialist system, it added.
					
					However, the trigger-happy forces should know that they can never bring to its knees Juche Korea led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, it stressed.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held an event in Shenyang, China on Feb. 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					Present there were Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the General Association of Koreans in China, representatives of branches of the Liaoning Regional Association, Koreans in China and the DPRK consul general in Shenyang.
					
					Also on hand were members of the Presidium of the Korean Businessmen's Association in China, Koreans Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange in Liaoning, Korean Businessmen's Association in Liaoning Province, Lecture Group of Old Volunteers and the Korean Old Men's Association in Shenyang and officials of Liaoning Province, China.
					
					The participants went round the venue of the Kimjongilia show for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					Then followed a meeting.
					
					Hwang Yong Du, chairperson of the Liaoning Regional Association, in a report said Kim Jong Il, who was born in Mt. Paektu, performed undying feats for the country and the nation, the era and mankind in the whole period of his revolutionary career.
					
					At the end of the meeting its participants watched a Korean film showing that the dear respected Kim Jong Un visited families of people who moved to new dwelling houses in Changjon Street.
					
					There took place a concert.

articles.title: DPRK's Stance for Sovereignty Supported by Peruvian, Bangladeshi Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Stance for Sovereignty Supported by Peruvian, Bangladeshi Organizations
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian institution and a Bangladeshi organization hit out at the anti-DPRK hostile policy of U.S. daring take issue with the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru stressed in its appeal on February 4:
					
					The "resolution" of the UN Security Council is nothing but a product of the moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to stifle the DPRK. They wantonly violated the sovereignty of the DPRK even though it launched a satellite for peaceful purposes by exercising the internationally recognized legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					The whole process of the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 clearly proved the peaceful nature of its policy for space development.
					
					Such behavior of the U.S. as desperately accusing the DPRK, being displeased with its scientific and technological development and space exploration, is the height of the application of the double standards by the U.S.
					
					It is impossible to realize peace on Korean Peninsula as long as the U.S. and the forces kowtowing to it are maintaining their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					We call upon the progressive political parties, organizations and women of Peru to positively support the Korean people's struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country.
					
					The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy stated on February 5:
					
					The U.S. behavior of having fabricated the UNSC's "resolution" is drawing condemnation and derision from the international community as it unjustly accused the DPRK of its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					The U.S. negation of the DPRK's independent and legitimate right to launch satellite shows that the former has schemed to stifle the latter with the satellite launch as a momentum.
					
					We positively support the DPRK that has started an all-out action to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the nation.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on February 1 and 6 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					They included an opening ceremony of book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Peru, meeting and photo exhibition in Mongolia and film show in Nigeria.
					
					On display in their venues were photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on show were their works, and books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and skill of the Korean people.
					
					The acting governor of a district of Ica City, Ica Province, Peru hoped that the Peruvian people would deeply realize the long history and developed culture of Korea through the exhibition.
					
					D. Michka, member of the guiding council of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society who is also general director of the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd., lauded Kim Jong Il for his great exploits in defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and providing a strong foundation for building an economic power by pursuing his original Songun politics.
					
					The general director also expressed support for the struggle of the Korean people advancing invariably along the road of independence true to the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il energetically led the work for glorifying the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung for all ages with boundless loyalty to him.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Mongolia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Political Party Leader of Tajikistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Political Party Leader of Tajikistan
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, issued a statement on February 4 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The statement said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great master of leadership and great model of independent politics recognized by the international community.
					
					He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche and constantly developed in depth the Juche idea as required by the era and the developing revolution, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					He let all members of society firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea and more solidly consolidated the single-minded unity of the DPRK in ideology and purpose and in the sense of moral obligation.
					
					By setting the Songun politics as basic political mode under socialism, he provided a guarantee for the cause of socialism to win victory after victory.
					
					Thanks to his energetic activities the Pyongyang Declaration was adopted, an event of great historical significance.
					
					Though he passed away, the Korean people are registering bigger successes in building a thriving socialist nation, united closer around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Brazil
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in pamphlet by the Asa Copias Publishing House of Brazil on Feb. 5.
					The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for the cause of national reunification.
					
					It also formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification, indicating tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Concluding Speech at WPK CMC Enlarged Meeting Supported by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Concluding Speech at WPK CMC Enlarged Meeting Supported by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Switzerland and France issued statements on Feb. 3 and 4 as regards the fact that an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission (CMC) of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was held under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea noted in their joint statement:
					
					At the meeting Marshal Kim Jong Un made an important concluding speech which would serve as guidelines for further strengthening the Korean People's Army (KPA) into an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and safeguarding security and sovereignty of the country.
					
					We positively support and hail the agenda items discussed at the enlarged meeting of the CMC of the WPK.
					
					The meeting will serve as a crucial occasion for bolstering up the military capabilities of the DPRK in all aspects.
					
					The historic concluding speech made by Kim Jong Un at the meeting is important guidelines for bringing about a radical turn in beefing up the military muscle of socialist Korea, and serves as a fresh milestone in the Songun revolution.
					
					The moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to provoke a new war against the DPRK after fabricating the illegal "resolution" of the UN Security Council against it met a strong rebuff from the heroic KPA.
					
					Provokers should not act rashly.
					
					The France-Korea Friendship Association in its statement also voiced full support for the concluding speech made by Kim Jong Un at the enlarged meeting.

articles.title: Declaracion de portavoz de MINREX de RPDC
articles.content:
Declaracion de portavoz de MINREX de RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 12 la siguiente declaracion:
					La tercera prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC es una rotunda medida autodefensiva frente al acto hostil de Estados Unidos contra esta.
					
					El exitoso lanzamiento del diciembre del ano pasado de la unidad No.2 de satelite "Kwangmyongsong-3" fue enteramente la labor pacifica realizada segun el plan del desarrollo de la ciencia y la tecnica para la construccion de la economia y la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Todo el mundo, inclusive los paises enemigos, reconocio la entrada de satelite de uso practico de la RPDC en la orbita prevista y quedo admirado ante el desarrollo de su tecnologia espacial.
					
					Sin embargo, Estados Unidos volvio a instigar a aprobar la nueva "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC como violacion de las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad.
					
					La violacion del derecho a lanzar el satelite es precisamente el dano a la soberania de la RPDC, razon por la cual nunca se tolerara tal acto hostil.
					
					A decir verdad, no nos necesitaba hacer sin falta la prueba nuclear ni teniamos tal plan.
					
					Nuestro disuasivo nuclear ya es capaz de aniquilar de un tiron los nidos principales de agresion golpeandolos con precision dondequiera que se encuentren en esta Tierra.
					
					Fue nuestra meta concentrar las fuerzas a la construccion economica y la mejora de la condicion de vida del pueblo apoyandonos en el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo preparado en toda su vida por los Generalisimos.
					
					Cuando EE.UU. instigo a aprobar en abril del ano pasado la "declaracion presidencial" que cuestiona el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC, abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, la RPDC mostro su autocontrol.
					
					Pero, el imperio infringio flagrantemente otra vez nuestro derecho a lanzar el satelite y llevo a la practica antes que nadie la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad, en vez de pedir disculpa, cuya recrudescente hostilidad nos obliga a no aguantar mas la paciencia.
					
					El objetivo principal de la presente prueba nuclear es para demostrar la indignacion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo ante el bandidesco acto hostil de EE.UU., la voluntad y la capacidad de la Corea del Songun de defender a toda costa la soberania del pais.
					
					Nuestra prueba nuclear es una justa medida autodefensiva que no contraviene a cualquier ley internacional.
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, el imperio puso a la RPDC en la lista de objetos de golpe preventivo nuclear.
					
					Enfrentarse con el disuasivo nuclear a la recrudescente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. es una medida de defensa absolutamente justa.
					
					A fin de salvaguardar el maximo interes del pais la RPDC se retiro del Tratado de no Proliferacion siguiendo el proceso legitimo y opto la via de disponerse del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo.
					
					En la historia de mas de 60 anos de la ONU  se realizaron  en la Tierra mas de 2 mil pruebas nucleares y mas de 9 mil lanzamientos de satelites, pero no hubo ninguna resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad que prohibiera hacerlos.
					
					El imperio, que realizo mayor numero de pruebas nucleares y lanzamientos de satelite, instigo a aprobar la "resolucion" del CS de la ONU que no permite hacerlos solo a la RPDC, lo cual deviene la violacion de los derechos internacionales y el climax de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Si el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU hubiera tenido la minima equidad, no habria cuestionado el ejercicio del derecho de autodefensa y las actividades de ciencia y tecnica con fines pacificas de un pais soberano sino la politica de golpe preventivo nuclear de EE.UU. que amenaza la paz y la seguridad internacionales.
					
					La presente prueba nuclear deviene la primera contramedida tomada por la RPDC manteniendose en el maximo control de si mismo.
					
					Si EE.UU. crea la situacion complicada  tomando hasta el fin las medidas hostiles contra  la RPDC, esta no podra menos de tomar sucesivamente la segunda y tercera contramedidas.
					
					El registro de los buques, el bloque maritimo de que hablan tanto las fuerzas hostiles se consideraran como accion de guerra y provocaran el despiadado golpe de represalia de la RPDC a los nidos principales.
					
					EE.UU. debe optar uno de los dilemas: respetar el derecho a lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC tendente a abrir la coyuntura de alivio y la estabilidad o seguir tomando el actual camino errado hacia la tensa situacion persiguiendo hasta el fin la politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					En el caso de tomar el camino de confrontacion, el mundo vera correctamente como defenderan hasta el fin los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC su dignidad y soberania en el combate de vida o muerte entre la justicia e injusticia y como acogeran con el triunfo final el gran evento revolucionario de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Se realiza con exito en RPDC tercera prueba nuclear subterranea
articles.content:
Se realiza con exito en RPDC tercera prueba nuclear subterranea
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 12 la siguiente informacion:
					El sector de ciencias de defensa nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realizo con exito el 12 de febrero del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea en el campo de experimentos de este tipo en la zona septentrional del pais.
					
					Esta prueba forma parte de las contramedidas practicas tomadas por la RPDC para defender la seguridad y la soberania del pais frente a las brutales hostilidades de Estados Unidos que violo flagrantemente el legitimo derecho de ella al lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos.
					
					A diferencia de las pruebas anteriores, la presente se realizo en alto nivel y de manera segura y perfecta usando la bomba atomica pequena y ligera, pero con alto poder explosivo. Se ha confirmado que ella no dio ninguna influencia negativa en el medioambiente del contorno.
					
					Todos los resultados de medicion como especificaciones de funcionamiento y poder explosivo de la bomba atomica coincidieron con los valores del diseno, lo cual demostro fisicamente las excelentes especificaciones del diversificado disuasivo nuclear de nuestro pais.
					
					La presente prueba nuclear marca un hito importante para asegurar la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region estimulando mucho la lucha de los militares y habitantes coreanos movilizados unanimemente en la construccion de un Estado prospero con el espiritu y temple con que habian conquistado el cosmos.

articles.title: Resolucion de la reunion del BP del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Resolucion de la reunion del BP del CC del PTC
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en esta capital la reunion del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					A la ocasion asistieron los miembros del Presidium, los miembros y miembros suplentes, del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					La reunion aprobo la resolucion "Para acoger como gran festival de los triunfadores el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el 60 de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria".
					
					El documento senala que deben profundizar la sagrada causa para enaltecer al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eternos lideres del PTC y la revolucion.
					
					Subraya la necesidad de organizar y efectuar con solemnidad y significacion el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y el 65o de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Enfatiza que en ocasion de la primera efemeride, organizaran con solemnidad el desfile militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el de masas de la ciudad de Pyongyang, la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", el acto conjunto militar-civil con los veteranos de guerra y otras actividades politicas.
					
					Recalca que construiran magnificamente el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y acondicionaran mejor el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Museo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Jonsung y otros lugares de batalla revolucionaria y de interes historico-revolucionario, el Museo de la historia revolucionaria y el Museo de la Revolucion.
					
					Senala que levantaran en esta capital el nuevo Cementerio de los Martires del Ejercito Popular y en las localidades del pais acondicionaran  cementerios de los martires del ejercito popular y monumentos a los martires.
					
					Hay que frustrar rotundamente con el exito orgulloso en la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo las maniobras de todas las fuerzas hostiles tendentes a aislar y aplastar la RPDC, apunta.
					
					Subraya que con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC todas las ramas y unidades deben hacer muchos trabajos positivos para contribuir a la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Se refiere a la necesidad de desplegar el intenso enfrentamiento frontal para defender fidedignamente la seguridad de la patria y la soberania del pais frente a la grave situacion creada actualmente y de celebrar con nuevos exitos en el fortalecimiento de defensa nacional el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y  el 60o del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Da enfasis en la necesidad de seguir lanzando los satelites de clase de Kwangmyongsong y los poderosos cohetes de largo alcance.
					
					El Ejercito Popular de Corea  hay que mantenerse en la plena disposicion de combate y completar los preparativos de combate capaces de aniquilar uno contra cien enemigos y si se de la orden, arrasara de un tiron los nidos principales de agresion y aniquilara a todos los imperialitas norteamericanos y el ejercito titere surcoreano para asi lograr la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria, apunta.
					
					Subraya que con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria realizaran con significacion la labor de ayudar activamente al ejercito, presentar en toda la sociedad a los veteranos belicos y los ameritados en la guerra y tratarlos con preferencia.
					
					Se refiere a la necesidad de dar acicate a la construccion de un Estado civilizado socialista.
					
					Para este fin, hay que completar dentro de este ano los preparativos para aplicar la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos, establecer la red de servicio de datos de informacion medica y el sistema de servicio medico de larga distancia,  construir los hospitales de pediatria,  los de estomatologia y el centro de rehabilitacion funcional y terminar la obra de primera serie para modernizar la fabrica farmaceutica de Hungnam.
					
					Hay que construir las modernas bases de entrenamiento combinado de  deportes y las instalaciones de deporte masivo de diversos generos y avivar el fervor de deporte en todo el pais, senala.
					
					Asevera que renovaran la fisonomia de la parte centrica de la ciudad de Pyongyang y construiran mucho mas los parques  de  atracciones, piscina de Munsu y otros modernos establecimientos culturales.
					
					Senala la necesidad de  exhortar a todos los connacionales a la lucha por abrir la nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion de la patria frustrando tajantemente las maniobras anti-RPDC y alborotos de "sancion" de los imperialitas norteamericanos y la banda de los traidores surcoreanos y ejecutando cabalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Hay que desplegar las actividades exteriores encaminadas a conmemorar con solemnidad el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria  como evento comun de las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas y los pueblos progresistas del mundo, finaliza.

articles.title: Acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il (Dia de la Estrella Luz), se efectuo el dia 12 el acto de juramento en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yong Chun, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea junto con los trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					
					Hubo discursos de juramento.
					
					El secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, senalo que el Dirigente fortalecio y desarrollo el PTC como organizacion gloriosa del Presidente Kim Il Sung e invencible fuerza orientadora y consolido la base eterna de cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Dijo que se debe lograr la victoria final en el enfrentamiento antiyanqui, que prosigue de siglo en siglo, con la bandera del PTC y bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y construir la mejor potencia y paraiso del pueblo admirado por todo el mundo.
					
					El general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kang Pyo Yong, subrayo que brillaran eternamente las hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien preparo invencible poderio militar y unidad monolitica trabajando con abnegacion por la patria y el pueblo y dando prioridad a las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Juro solemnemente demostrar el poderio invencible del ejercito revolucionario crecido en el regazo de los Generales del monte Paektu e izar en alto las banderas con efigies de sol de los Generalisimos y la roja del PTC.  
					
					Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, recalco que al practicar la politica de dar importancia y amar a la juventud, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il formo a los jovenes coreanos como destacamento politico de reserva del Partido y sucesores de la revolucion.
					
					Bajo la antorcha de la revolucion entregada por el Generalisimo, registraremos las huellas de victoria en la construccion de un Estado prospero trabajando con el orgullo de ser destacamento de reserva y tropa especial del Mariscal, decidio.
					
					Seguidamente, se dispararon al cielo local los fuegos artificiales.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta conflictivo modo de pensar de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta conflictivo modo de pensar de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Durante una reciente orgia con sus lacayos,  el traidor Lee Myung Bak describio la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como una "entidad" mientras hablaba de la supuesta "provocacion del Norte (de Corea)".
					En un comentario individual difundido este martes, el periodico Minju Joson senala que esa expresion de Lee deja conocer su mal genio y modo de pensar conflictivo con la RPDC:
					
					La camarilla traidora de Lee Myung Bak comete actos provocadores que agravan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ni los anteriores dictadores fascistas del Sur de Corea, que ganaron la mala fama por sus acciones antinacionales y anti-reunificacion, se atrevieron a definir la RPDC como "entidad".
					
					El traidor Lee es imbecil que no sabe lo que es una entidad y lo que es un Estado.
					
					Ya a los principios de su mandato, Lee ha sido ridiculizado por los habitantes surcoreanos como hombre con una capacidad mental de "2MB".
					
					Aunque Lee Myung Bak trata de desprestigiar a la RPDC con imprecaciones, no podra manchar la digna imagen de ella ni impedir su avance.
					
					En el futuro tambien, la RPDC seguira ejerciendo sus derechos independientes como digno Estado soberano.
